H3.text: what religion does madonna practice. Catholicism

A4.text: Her study of Kabbalah has also influenced her creatively, prominently on the album Ray of Light (1998).

A5.text: Madonna remarked that she has always felt an 'inexplicable connection' to Catholicism and stated that it consistently manifests throughout her work.
